fetchr.error.incompatible_minecraft_vers: Ye be usin' an unsupported version o' Minecraft. Dis pack has been made compatible fer Minecraft versions %s-%s
Ye be usin' an unsupported version o' Minecraft. Dis pack has been made compatible fer Minecraft version %s
fetchr.error.spigot_paper: Ye be likely usin' a version o' Spigot or Paper. Paper 'n Spigot alter vanilla behavior 'n be incompatible wit' Fetchr.
fetchr.error.spigot_paper.help:
Ye can use a vanilla server, or use Fabric or Quilt wit' Lithium fer best performance.

If ye needs further assistance or be seein' dis message despite nah usin' Paper or Spigot, please report dis issue on %s or %s
fetchr.setup.error.unknown_category: Arr, item %1$s be in category %2$s, but alas, category %2$s be nowhere to be found!
fetchr.actionbar.wrong_resourcepack_erro: Arr, ye've got a mismatched version of the Fetchr resource pack enabled, matey!
fetchr.resourcepack_check.go_to_lobby.pa: Arr, the resource pack be successfully hoisted and ready to sail!
Arr, %s to set sail for the lobby!
Arr, ye've got the wrong version of the resource pack enabled, matey!

Arr, ye be usin' an incompatible version of the Fetchr resource pack!

Make sure to grab the right version %s, hoist it up, and then click 're-check' below to sail on!
If the resource pack be applied automatically through a server resource pack, be sure to tell the server captain to update it!
fetchr.game.menu.heading: Menu o' Fetchr
fetchr.game.menu.options.enter_spectator: Take a look from the crow's nest
fetchr.game.menu.options.reveal_card.act: %s has unfurled the bingo map, matey!
fetchr.game.menu.options.teleport_all: Call it a day for all hands on deck
fetchr.game.menu.hint: Arr, ye can click %s anywhere to bring up Menu o' Fetchr. Ye can also run %s manually, replacin' %s with the action ready for completi’n!
fetchr.game.switch_gamemode.prevented: Arr, the game mode switch be blocked! %s for Spectator Mode, matey. Once ye’ve done that, ye can switch to any other mode ye please!
fetchr.game.switch_gamemode.hint: Arr, ye can use the command %s at any time to switch to Spectator Mode, if ye fancy. If this be not to yer liking, ye can disable it in yer preferences on the ship's deck, matey!
